summary: BRITAX CHAPERONE CAR SEAT CHEST CLIP BROKE INTO TWO PIECES ON BOTH MY CAR SEAT, I HAVE SMALL INFANT TWINS. I CONTACTED BRITAX AND TEY SAID IT WAS A VOLUNTARY RECALL AND THEIR ENGINEERS STATE THE CAR SEATS WERE SAFE TO OPERATE WITHOUT THE CHEST CLIP. THEY ARE NOT SAFE AS ONE OF THE BABIES GOT OUT OF THE CAR SEAT ON THE FREEWAY. BRITAX REFUSED TO VERNIGHT ME THE NEEDED CHEST CLIP. IT WAS ORDERED THREE WEEKS AGO AND ONLY GIVES ME A TRACKING NUMBER. THIS COMPANY IS NEGLIGENT AND NONRESPONSIVE.  *TR
